sentences.sContent: Yuena is Rome empress, while the Romans worshiped her as the God of women and marriage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yuena is Rome empress, while the Romans worshiped her as the God of women and marriage.
sentences.sCn: 约娜是罗马众神的皇后，罗马人同时将她尊奉为妇女和婚姻之神。

trans.tranOther: a female ruler of an empire, or the wife of an emperor
